entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
